2058270.name: Monsters Versus Pals
2058270.description:
Gameplay
Like a MOBA but with much bigger and more powerful creep waves. Players control a powerful third person hero similar to action RPGs. Choose between spending resources on upgrading your hero, increasing the amount and strength of your creeps, or on defenses.

Monsters Vs Pals will release with Cooperative Online play with more game modes coming at a later date.

Story
More and more monsters have been appearing throughout the Kingdom from unknown origins. Unable to protect the land with only his Knights, the King turns to his faithful Wizard who forcibly summons warriors called Pals from another world.
